Uses of Class
moulton.scalable.visuals.Animation

Packages that use Animation
Package Description
moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.

  • Uses of Animation in moulton.scalable.visuals

    Fields in moulton.scalable.visuals declared as Animation
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Animation AnimatedView.animation
    The image that will be drawn onto the coordinates provided.
    protected Animation AnimatedButton.clickedAnimation
    The image to draw on the face of the button when clicked.
    protected Animation AnimatedButton.mainAnimation
    The image drawn on the face of the button when not clicked.
    protected Animation AnimatedButton.touchedAnimation
    The animation to draw on the face of the button when touched.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.visuals that return Animation
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Animation AnimatedView.getAnimation()
    Gets the animation to be drawn.
    protected Animation AnimatedButton.getDrawAnimation()
    Returns the animation to draw.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.visuals with parameters of type Animation
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void AnimationListener.animationEndEvent​(Animation animation)
    This action occurs when an animation reaches a natural end and stops.
    void AnimationListener.animationLoopEvent​(Animation animation)
    This action occurs when an animation reaches a natural end but continues because of a loop setting.
    void AnimatedButton.setAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Sets the animation that this button will display on its face.
    void AnimatedView.setAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Sets the Animation that this view will draw when rendered.
    void AnimatedButton.setClickedAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Sets the animation that this button will display on its face when clicked
    void AnimatedButton.setTouchedAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Sets the animation that this button will display on its face when touched.
    Constructors in moulton.scalable.visuals with parameters of type Animation
